body_html: Ugh I'm pretty sure it can be made to work without all this whitespace. We have to do something about it. A lot of people (including me) have their editors set to automatically trim trailing spaces and it's going to be a nightmare to decline every PR to the docs and tell people to fix the whitespace again.

body: Ugh I'm pretty sure it can be made to work without all this whitespace. We have to do something about it. A lot of people (including me) have their editors set to automatically trim trailing spaces and it's going to be a nightmare to decline every PR to the docs and tell people to fix the whitespace again.
